org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.archive

Class MemoryArchivist

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.archive.MemoryArchivist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArchiveListener

    public class MemoryArchivist
extends Object
implements ArchiveListener
    Implementation of the ArchiveListener, that archives old data of the jobmanager in memory

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemoryArchivist(int max_entries)
